metadata.title: CVE-2022-3599 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
LibTIFF 4.4.0 has an out-of-bounds read in writeSingleSection intools/tiffcrop.c:7345, allowing attackers to cause a denial-of-service viaa crafted tiff file. For users that compile libtiff from sources, the fixis available with commit e8131125.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-3599` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.3.0-6ubuntu0.2
libtiff-tools - 4.3.0-6ubuntu0.2
libtiff5 - 4.3.0-6ubuntu0.2
libtiffxx5 - 4.3.0-6ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.3.0-6ubuntu0.2').
